QuestData.Title: All of the Arrows
QuestData.Description: As soon as their reinforcements arrive, the yaungol are going to overrun our position here. If they do that, the village will be lost.$B$BWould you be willing to retrieve as many arrows off the battlefield as you can carry? I have a plan that just might save us with your help.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many arrows do you have?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. You've saved our defensive line here.$B$BThis next attack wouldn't have been possible without you.
